trans-unit.source: Represents a data view on an XML node or collection of XML nodes for an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 代表 XML 節點或集合的 XML 節點上的資料檢視<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> control can present its underlying data in both tabular and hierarchical format to Web server controls that bind to it.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>控制項可以呈現其基礎資料格式表格式和階層式 Web 伺服器控制項的繫結到它。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: Controls such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> to bind to XML data and present it in list or tabular form, while controls that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> class, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>, bind to XML data and present it in hierarchical form.
trans-unit.target: 這類控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>繫結至 XML 資料，並加以呈現在清單或表格式表單中，而控制項衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>類別，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>、 繫結至 XML 資料，並以階層形式呈現。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> creates each view type internally through different code paths.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>建立每種檢視類型，在內部執行不同的程式碼路徑。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource.GetView%2A> method is called on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> control, an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView> object is created by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource.GetView%2A>上呼叫方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>控制項，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView>物件由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource.GetView%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource.GetHierarchicalView%2A> method is called, an XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView object is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource.GetHierarchicalView%2A>呼叫方法時，會建立 XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView 物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource.GetHierarchicalView%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView> class is provided for Web server controls that derive from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> and bind to lists and tabular data, while the XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView is provided for Web server controls that derive from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> and bind to hierarchical data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView>類別提供給 Web 伺服器控制項衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>繫結至清單和表格式資料、 XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView 時提供的 Web 伺服器控制項衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>並繫結至階層式資料。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: Internally, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeDataBoundControl> classes call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView.Select%2A> method of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView> object view to retrieve data from a data source, while a class derived from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 就內部而言，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeDataBoundControl>類別會呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView.Select%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView>物件檢視，以便擷取資料來源的資料時的類別衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView.Select%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeDataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>

trans-unit.source: Like all <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView> helper objects, the XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView defines the operations that the data source can perform with the underlying data.
trans-unit.target: 如同所有<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView>協助程式物件，XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView 定義資料來源可以使用基礎資料執行的作業。</xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: Because the XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView class only overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A> method, the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> control does not support sort expressions or execute, delete, or update operations.
trans-unit.target: 因為 XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView 類別只覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A>方法]、 [相關聯<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>控制項不支援排序運算式或執行、 刪除或更新作業。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of the data items from the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: 從基礎資料來源取得資料的項目清單。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable> that is returned by <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A> is an <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> and can be used like any <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable>所傳回<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A>是<xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>和任何可用於<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>集合。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> </xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> </xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A> method to get an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> and iterate through the collection of <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> nodes, or use `foreach` (in C#) or `For Each` (Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A>方法來取得<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>並逐一查看集合的<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>節點或使用`foreach`（C# 中） 或`For Each`(Visual Basic)。</xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable"></xref> collection of data items based on the hierarchical level of the current view.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable"> </xref>資料項目的集合，依據目前檢視的階層層級。
